title: Bombers at GG EZ Melbourne
body:
Join us at GG EZ Bar this Friday to watch the OPL - Oceanic Pro League Gauntlet for Split 1 - 2019!

Start Time: 4pm (Melbourne)
Event Concludes between 7-10pm *dependant on Gauntlet matches*
Address: GGEZ, (Basement of 93/95 Queen St, Melbourne, VIC, 3000).

Fan Opportunities will include:

- Player/Fan Photos
- Player Signings 
- Sponsor Giveaways!
- Merch Giveaways!
- RP/Skin Giveaways!

Don't miss out on an opportunity to meet and greet the team!
